entry.title: The DJI Mavic Pro drone just dropped to its lowest price ever
entry.summary: DJI's Mavic Pro dropped to the all time low price of $769. The Verge reviewed the drone earlier with a score of 9.5/10.

entry.title: What Silicon Valley is doing to make humans live longer
entry.summary: Biotech startups in the Silicon Valley region are researching certain genes, stem cells, and special regenerative proteins that can increase the human lifespan.

entry.title: Mysterious $15,000 'GrayKey' Promises To Unlock iPhone X For The Feds
entry.summary: An obscure American startup named Grayshift, which appears to be run by long-time U.S. intelligence agency contractors and an ex-Apple security engineer, is offering a $15,000 iPhone unlock tool named GrayKey, which permits 300 uses.
